Plot: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.
Title: The New World
Actors: Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christopher Plummer, Christian Bale
tomatoConsensus: Despite arresting visuals and strong lead performances, The New World suffers from an unfocused narrative that will challenge viewers' attention spans over its 2 1/2 hours.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 25 nominations.
